publication.title: An extensive comparison of recent classification tools applied to microarray data
publication.authors: jae won lee,jung bok lee,seuck heun song
publication.keyword: Feature Selection;Gene Expression;Gene Selection;Microarray Data;Microarray Data Analysis;
publication.abstract: Abstract Since most classi%cation articles have applied a single technique to a single gene expression dataset, it is crucial to assess the performance of each method through a comprehensive com- parative study. We evaluate by extensive comparison study extending Dudoit et al. (J. Amer. Statist. Assoc. 97 (2002) 77) the performance of recently developed classi%cation methods in microarray experiment, and

publication.title: Correspondence analysis approach for finding allele associations in population genetic study
